data.message: HELLO I AM TRYING TO CONTACT A YOUNG LADY NAME ANGELINA TILLMAN SHE SAY THAT SHE IS A AGENT THAT WORK FOR FACEBOOK DO YOU GUYS KNOW OF HER

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Ladii. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. Thanks! -Jessica
